content: No surprises here, that our elected representatives represent themselves, and not us. They are millionaires, career politicians who wouldn’t know a poor person if they but into one. These representatives of the rich have no worries about healthcare, and no student loans. They just told Americans, once again, let them eat cake if they have no bread. I hope each person remembers this, among betrayals of Americans, at the 2018 midterm elections. On this issue alone, I will vote against my sitting congressmen in 2018. They have failed to represent me here again!
